body: A taiaha is a long, heavy stick, club-shaped at one end and tipped with a wooden or metal spear point at the other. You wield it with a combination of solid strikes with the club and fending motions with the spear. A taiaha can be wielded as a martial weapon that deals 1d8/×2 bludgeoning damage.
name: Taiaha
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Primitive Armor and Weapons/The Stone Age/Taiaha
